blocks.name: itunifval
blocks.content: Function value of iterated unions. _EDITORIAL_: The iterated unions and order types of ordered sets are split out here because they could conceivably be independently useful. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm itunifval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))), c0), com)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s1, universe, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))), cv(s1)), com)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))), c0), com))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))), c0), com)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(s1, c0, universe, c2, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))), c0), com), cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))), cv(s1)), com))
  reseq1d(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))), cv(s1)), com, crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  rdgeq2(cv(s1), c0, cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))))
  mp2an(wcel(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))), c0), com), universe), wfun(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))), c0)), wcel(com, universe))
  rdgfun(cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))), c0)
  omex()
  resfunexg(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))), c0), com, universe)
  diff.cres.s(s1, crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))), c0), com)
  diff.crdg.s(s1, cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0))), c0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, universe, cuni(cv(s0)))
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.cuni.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.com.s(s1)
}

thm itunifval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ c1 â†’(c2 ` c0)=(rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s0), c0)|` _om))
  âŠ£ c2 =(s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s0), s1)|` _om))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 âˆˆ c1 â†’(c2 ` c0)=(rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s0), c0)|` _om)), d(s0, c0))
  syl(c0 âˆˆ c1, (c2 ` c0)=(rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s0), c0)|` _om), c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(s1, c0, universe, c2, (rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s0), c0)|` _om), (rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s0), s1)|` _om))
  reseq1d(rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s0), s1), com, rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s0), c0), s1 = c0)
  rdgeq2(s1, c0, (s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s0))
  mp2an((rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s0), c0)|` _om)âˆˆ ğ•Œ, Fun(rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s0), c0)), _om âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  rdgfun((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s0), c0)
  omex()
  resfunexg(rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s0), c0), com, universe)
  diff.cres.s(s1, rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s0), c0), com)
  diff.crdg.s(s1, (s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s0), c0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, universe, â‹ƒ s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.cuni.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.com.s(s1)
}

thm itunisuc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), csuc(c2)), cuni(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, universe, cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), cv(s0)), com)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), csuc(c2)), cuni(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), csuc(c2)), cuni(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), csuc(c2)), cuni(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2))), wcel(c1, universe))
  pm2.61dan(wcel(c1, universe), wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), csuc(c2)), cuni(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2))), wcel(c2, com))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), csuc(c2)), cuni(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2)), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), csuc(c2)), cuni(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2)), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, com)))
  adantl(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, com), wceq(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), csuc(c2)), cuni(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2))))
  syl6eq(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), csuc(c2)), cuni(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2)), cfv(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2)), wcel(c2, com))
  frsuc(c2, cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2)), cuni(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2))), wcel(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2), universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2), universe, cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), cuni(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2)), cuni(cv(hs0)))
  unieq(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2))
  cbvmptv(s1, hs0, universe, cuni(cv(s1)), cuni(cv(hs0)))
  unieq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))
  uniex(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2))
  fvex(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2)
  adantr(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, com), wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), csuc(c2)), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), csuc(c2))))
  fveq1d(cfv(c0, c1), csuc(c2), cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), wcel(c1, universe))
  unieqd(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, com)))
  adantr(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, com), wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2)))
  fveq1d(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), wcel(c1, universe))
  itunifval(s1, s0, c1, universe, c0)
  3eqtr4a(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), csuc(c2)), cuni(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2)), emptycls, cuni(emptycls), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wn(wcel(c2, com))))
  eqcomi(emptycls, cuni(emptycls))
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wn(wcel(c2, com))), wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), csuc(c2)), emptycls), wn(wcel(csuc(c2), cdm(cfv(c0, c1)))))
  biimpar(wcel(c1, universe), wn(wcel(c2, com)), wn(wcel(csuc(c2), cdm(cfv(c0, c1)))))
  notbid(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(csuc(c2), cdm(cfv(c0, c1))), wcel(c2, com))
  syl6bbr(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(csuc(c2), cdm(cfv(c0, c1))), wcel(c2, com), wcel(csuc(c2), com))
  eleq2d(csuc(c2), cdm(cfv(c0, c1)), com, wcel(c1, universe))
  peano2b(c2)
  ndmfv(csuc(c2), cfv(c0, c1))
  unieqd(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2), emptycls, wa(wcel(c1, universe), wn(wcel(c2, com))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wn(wcel(c2, com))), wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2), emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(c0, c1)))))
  biimpar(wcel(c1, universe), wn(wcel(c2, com)), wn(wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(c0, c1)))))
  notbid(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(c0, c1))), wcel(c2, com))
  eleq2d(c2, cdm(cfv(c0, c1)), com, wcel(c1, universe))
  syl(wcel(c1, universe), wceq(cdm(cfv(c0, c1)), com), wfn(cfv(c0, c1), com))
  itunifn(s0, s1, c1, universe, c0)
  fndm(cfv(c0, c1), com)
  ndmfv(c2, cfv(c0, c1))
  3eqtr4a(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), csuc(c2)), cuni(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2)), cfv(emptycls, csuc(c2)), cuni(cfv(emptycls, c2)), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  3eqtr4ri(cfv(emptycls, csuc(c2)), cuni(cfv(emptycls, c2)), cuni(emptycls), emptycls)
  uni0()
  unieqi(cfv(emptycls, c2), emptycls)
  0fv(c2)
  0fv(csuc(c2))
  fveq1d(cfv(c0, c1), csuc(c2), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  unieqd(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2), cfv(emptycls, c2), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fveq1d(cfv(c0, c1), c2, emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), c1), com), c2)))
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.cuni.s(s1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(cv(s1)))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

  frsuc(c2, (s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s1), c1)

  fvmpt(hs0, ((rec((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s1), c1)|` _om)` c2), universe, (s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s1), â‹ƒ((rec((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s1), c1)|` _om)` c2), â‹ƒ hs0)
  unieq(hs0, ((rec((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s1), c1)|` _om)` c2))

  fvex((rec((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s1), c1)|` _om), c2)
  adantr(c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c2 âˆˆ _om, ((c0 ` c1)` suc(c2))=((rec((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s1), c1)|` _om)` suc(c2)))
  fveq1d((c0 ` c1), suc(c2), (rec((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s1), c1)|` _om), c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  unieqd(((c0 ` c1)` c2), ((rec((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ s1), c1)|` _om)` c2), (c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ _om))

blocks.name: itunitc1
blocks.content: Each union iterate is a member of the transitive closure. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm itunitc1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wss(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2), cfv(ctc, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, universe, cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cuni(cv(s1))), cv(s0)), com)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wss(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2), cfv(ctc, c1)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wss(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2), cfv(ctc, c1)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wss(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2), cfv(ctc, c1)), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wss(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2), cfv(ctc, c1)), diffsc(s1, c2))

blocks.name: hsmexlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ hsmex . Bound the order type of a union of sets of ordinals, each of limited order type. Vaguely reminiscent of ~ unictb but use of order types allows to canonically choose the sub-bijections, removing the choice requirement. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 18-Sep-2021.)

blocks.name: hsmexlem3
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ hsmex . Clear ` I ` hypothesis and extend previous result by dominance. Note that this could be substantially strengthened, e.g., using the weak Hartogs function, but all we need here is that there be *some* dominating ordinal. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: hsmex
blocks.content: The collection of hereditarily size-limited well-founded sets comprise a set. The proof is that of Randall Holmes at ~ http://math.boisestate.edu/~~holmes/holmes/hereditary.pdf , with modifications to use Hartogs' theorem instead of the weak variant (inconsequentially weakening some intermediate results), and making the well-foundedness condition explicit to avoid a direct dependence on ~ ax-reg . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Feb-2015.)
